::Killfest::

Killfest enters the bridge, looking around. No enemies.

"They're not here," he states the obvious, "Scan she ship for where 
they might be, other than the engine room."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He heard fire from inside. 
> "Lets move, Killfest!"
> He bursts into the Bridge, and sees Apoc. He stands ready to shoot 
any
> of Megs troops.
> 
> OOC: Is there any Meg troops there?
